game.title: Beyond the Horizon
game.synopsis: Set against a post-apocalyptic landscape, Beyond the Horizon tells the tale of Anya, a courageous young woman searching for a glimmer of hope in a chaotic and unforgiving world. Facing endless hordes of mutated creatures and navigating treacherous lands, Anya is on a mission to uncover the secrets of the past and bring about a new dawn for humanity.
game.beginning: As Anya embarks on her journey, she discovers remnants of a lost civilization...
game.ending: In a climactic confrontation, Anya must confront the ultimate evil to restore balance to the world...
